quotes.text: You have the power to heal your life, and you need to know that.
They don't know that we know they know we know.
Don't it make you sad to know that life is more than who you are?
What was the meaning of your being so baptized? I was thereby given up in a covenant-way, to Father, Son, and Holy Ghost.
quotes.source: A Plain Catechism for Children by Matthew Henry

quotes.text: HOW must you evidence the sincerity of your faith and repentance? By a diligent and conscientious obedience to all God's commandments.
quotes.source: A Plain Catechism for Children by Matthew Henry
